name: Galle Fish Curry
description: Rich Southern fish curry with thick coconut milk
instructions: Marinate fish with salt and turmeric
Add pandan and curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
cultural_notes: Galle's signature fish curry, very rich Use fresh fish from coastal markets. Goraka (garcinia) is essential for authentic sour taste - never substitute with tamarind. The curry should have a deep red color from roasted spices.
description_sinhala: ඝන පොල් කිරි සමග පොහොසත් දකුණු මාළු කරිය
description_tamil: அடர்த்தியான தேங்காய் பாலுடன் பணக்கார தெற்கு மீன் குழம்பு
cultural_notes_sinhala: Galle's signature fish curry, very rich
cultural_notes_tamil: காலியின் சிக்னேச்சர் மீன் குழம்பு, மிகவும் பணக்காரமானது
